content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Sadyr Japarov

.]]
This is a list of presidential trips made by Sadyr Japarov, the 6th President of the Kyrgyz Republic.
2021
{| class="wikitable "
! rowspan="1" |City and Country
! rowspan="1" align="center" width="150" |Dates
! colspan="1" align="center" |Host
! rowspan="1" align="center" width="150" |Notes
|-
|Moscow, Russia
|25–26 February
|President Vladimir Putin
|Official visit. Met with Tatar President Rustam Minnikhanov.
|-
|Nur-Sultan, Kazakhstan
|2–3 March
|President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev
|Official visit.
|-
|Tashkent, Uzbekistan
|11–12 March
|President Shavkat Mirziyoyev
|Official visit. Visited the Innovative Technopark "Yashnabad" in Tashkent.
|-
|Sochi, Russia
|24 May
|President Vladimir Putin
|Working visit.
|-
|Ankara, Turkey
|9-11 June
|President Recep Tayyip Erdogan
|Official visit.
|-

|27-28 June
|President Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedow
|Official visit.
|-
|Dushanbe, Tajikistan
|28-29 June
|President Emomali Rahmon
|Official visit.
|-
|Türkmenbaşy, Turkmenistan
|5-6 August
|President Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedow
|Working visit.
|}
